summary: A small, open (no loading screens) shack located north of Falkreath for the player to live in.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]

A small open shack on top of a hill overlooking Falkreath available to the player to live in. Starting a new play through, I decided to make a place for my character to stay in, therefore it suits my character\'s personality and needs. The area surrounding the shack has been slightly edited with a few more trees, ferns and general aesthetic touch ups. It\'s follower friendly with a few idle markers for them to use, and navmeshed. I wouldn\'t really recommend more than 3 followers (If you use mods such as UFO) wandering around, because it might get cramped. First mod I ever felt like uploading; please let me know if you find anything wrong.

Features:
Bed
Safe Storage
Book Shelf
2 Weapon Racks
Cooking Pot
Alchemy Table
Workbench
Tanning Rack
Sharpening Stone
Anvil
Chopping Block
A couple removable torches, since the enb I use makes it really dark at night
Nice view of town
[s]Goonzy\'s love[/s] Feature belongs to someone else.


Simply drop the .esp into your skyrim Data folder.

Most likely compatible with anything that doesn\'t modify the area in this cell. Though you shouldn\'t have to worry too much about things spawning and killing you nearby, be aware that mods that add more spawns in the world may interfere. 
WARZONES NPCs (or anything similar) might feel like hanging out around your shack, and use your equipment. 
Also keep in mind, there is no collision detection for rain, so if you\'re using any rain texture replacers, might storm a little bit inside. Default rain is more believable, leaky unpatched roof and all.
author: Goonzy
